flex2.linker

Interface LinkerConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationCompilerConfiguration, CommandLineConfiguration, CompcConfiguration, Configuration, LibraryCompilerConfiguration, LinkerConfiguration, ToolsConfiguration

    public interface LinkerConfiguration
    This interface is used to restrict consumers of flex2.compiler.common.Configuration to linker specific options.
    Author:
    Clement Wong

      • getTargetPlayerMajorVersion

        int getTargetPlayerMajorVersion()
        Returns:
        The major version of the player targeted by this application. The returned value will be greater to or equal to 9.

      • getTargetPlayerMinorVersion

        int getTargetPlayerMinorVersion()
        Returns:
        The minor version of the player targeted by this application. The returned value will be greater to or equal to 0.

      • getTargetPlayerRevision

        int getTargetPlayerRevision()
        Returns:
        The revision of the player targeted by this application. The returned value will be greater to or equal to 0.
